remarks: Addition of infinite sums.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Mar-2017.)
statement:
esumadd.0 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
esumadd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumadd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
esumadd $p |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A ( B +e C ) = ( sum* k e. A B +e sum* k e. A C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d V k $.
$d k ph $.
